name: Adojuru
description:
Adojuru is a puzzle game created for players who want to compete.
The game lists several levels that the player must unlock. Each unlocked level brings a score of 5 points. 
The player has the possibility to replay a level already won, but his score will increase by 3 points.
Once the player feels ready, they can submit their score to view the leaderboard. The leaderboard only displays the top 100 ("NC" if you are not ranked).
Every 3rd of the month, the old ranking is reset in order to start a new ranking.
The Adojuru game contains music to help you relax while playing, and a random button to launch the game according to your choices.
Until then, have fun and don't forget to donate to us to help the team in their work.
Best day/evening to you.
